post.title: CC Foundation
post.content-1: CC Foundation was founded on May 4th 2021 with the primary mission of funding sustainable community development initiatives/programs/projects by individuals and organizations in strict accordance with current rules and regulations.
post.content-2: CC Foundation is organized and functions on non-profit and voluntary principles. We cover operating expenses by ourselves and do not raise extra fund. We are accountable to the law for our actions and maintain transparent operating, financial and asset disclosure systems. We work on the principle of non-discrimination, independent and neutral from any political, economic and religious organizations.
